title: High-Tech Entrepreneurship and New Media Software Development: Constructivist Experiential Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Mobile-based collaborative learning environment for solving startup field problems

learning_goals: Collaborative mobile software prototype development based on real startup cases

Following constructivist principles, learners can submit a problem definition (1 page), design document (2 pages), implementation code (≥50 lines), and evaluation report (1 page) for one given math problem (e.g., optimization, statistical modeling).
Fleshing out entrepreneurial ideas and creating business model canvases through new media trend analysis
Establishing a knowledge-sharing and feedback system for Communities of Practice (CoP) using mobile-based collaboration tools

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
